description: пересоздание индекса если нужно добавить новый столбец в индекс
body:
if exists ( select	*
			from	sys.indexes i
			where	object_id = object_id(N'dbo.TableName')
					and name = N'IDX_IndexName'
					and not exists ( select	*
									 from	sys.index_columns ic
											join sys.columns c on c.object_id = ic.object_id
																  and c.column_id = ic.column_id
									 where	ic.index_id = i.index_id
											and ic.object_id = i.object_id
											and c.name = 'Column1' ) )

	create unique clustered index IDX_IndexName
	on cab.TableName ( Column0, Column1 )
	with (drop_existing=on);
go
